about_the_game:
Welcome to the E.Y.E. Order...

Set in the 1960s, Playtown Genesis places you in the role of Doctor Clint, a newly hired scientist at the Eye Order, a secret underground facility with a dark history. Founded in the 1700s, the Eye Order was established as a sanctuary for sentient eyeballs powered by glowing crystals mined from nearby caves. These eerie beings have used the crystals to fuel their advanced laboratories, maintaining control over the facility for centuries.

Join the rebellion...

As you begin your work, disturbing events unfold, revealing the Eye Order’s true nature. You discover a hidden rebellion within the facility, led by those who seek to overthrow Hexcor, the ruthless leader of the organization. Drawn into the conflict, you must navigate the terrifying corridors of the Order, using stealth and wits to survive, and aid the resistance in their fight to bring down Hexcor’s oppressive regime.

Outsmart, Uncover, and Survive

In Playtown Genesis, you’ll need to use stealth and clever thinking to move through the eerie corridors of the Eye Order without getting caught by its watchful guards. As Doctor Clint, you'll uncover dark secrets hidden deep within the facility, but trust no one. Every step is risky, and a wrong move could bring Hexcor's brutal enforcers down on you. To stay safe, you'll need to crouch to avoid making noise, sneak past enemies, and work with Garnet, a key ally in the rebellion, on dangerous missions to take down the regime. Outsmart enemies, gather crucial information, and help the resistance bring down the oppressive order from the inside.

Solve Puzzles

In Playtown Genesis, your journey as Doctor Clint is packed with puzzles that uncover the chilling lore of the Eye Order. Each puzzle you solve brings you closer to revealing Hexcor’s dark secrets and provides crucial tools for the rebellion. Explore the facility’s twisted layout, where every corner presents a new challenge—whether it’s spying on Hexcor and his dinosaur assistant, Yolt, or manipulating the glowing crystals that power the place. As you move quietly through the shadows, you’ll gather clues and team up with Garnet on missions to disable security systems, retrieve important information, and sabotage Hexcor's plans. But watch out: the guards are always on the lookout, and any noise could lead to trouble. Use your wits to outsmart your enemies and support the rebellion in their fight against Hexcor’s cruel control.

name: Playtown Genesis

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500K or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 2 GB or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4790K or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A stealth-based adventure set in the 1960s where you play as Doctor Clint, navigating the dangerous corridors of a secret underground facility. Outsmart guards, avoid detection, and team up with rebels to bring down a brutal regime.
